name: AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.isOver_iff
initialProofState:
X Y S : AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme
inst✝¹ : X.Over S
inst✝ : Y.Over S
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
⊢ Iff (AlgebraicGeometry.Scheme.Hom.IsOver f S) (Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f (CategoryTheory.over Y S inferInstance)) (CategoryTheory.over X S inferInstance))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma Hom.isOver_iff [X.Over S] [Y.Over S] {f : X ⟶ Y} : f.IsOver S ↔ f ≫ Y ↘ S = X ↘ S :=
  ⟨fun H ↦ H.1, fun h ↦ ⟨h⟩⟩
